doc.description:
PCA95XX external GPIO peripheral
Uses the gpio_ext_common mechanism for transparent redirecting of gpio calls. Multiple PCA95XX can be used, on different I2C busses. Configuration and writing can be performed non-blocking (reading is always blocking).
All defines can be given as comma-separated lists to support multiple ICs.

define.name: PCA95XX_PORTS
define.description: External GPIO ports provided by the respective PCA95XX.

define.name: PCA95XX_I2C_PERIPHS
define.description: I2C bus the respective IC is connected to.

define.name: PCA95XX_ADDRESSES
define.description: I2C addresses of the respective devices.

define.name: PCA95XX_BLOCKINGS
define.description: Whether writing to this device it blocking or not.
